quotes.quoteText: I've had to learn to fight all my life - got to learn to keep smiling. If you smile things will work out.
quotes.author: Serena Williams

quotes.quoteText: I'm an athlete and I'm black, and a lot of black athletes go broke. I do not want to become a statistic, so maybe I overcompensate. But I'm paranoid. Oprah told me a long time ago, 'You sign every check. Never let anyone sign any checks.'
quotes.author: Serena Williams

quotes.quoteText: The glory is being happy. The glory is not winning here or winning there. The glory is enjoying practicing, enjoy every day, enjoying to work hard, trying to be a better player than before.
quotes.author: Rafael Nadal

quotes.quoteText: Being home alone at night makes me a bit nervous. If I'm at home alone, I have to sleep on the sofa - I can't face going to bed. I'm there with the TV on and all the lights on. I'm not very brave about anything in life. In tennis, yes. In everything else, not very.
quotes.author: Rafael Nadal

quotes.quoteText: A huge adrenaline rush is usually followed by a pretty low point.
quotes.author: Bode Miller

quotes.quoteText: People want athletes to cater to their image of what an athlete should be, but they also want them to fail so they can feel like their screwups are all right. If I make a priority shift, I'll make it because it's best for me.'
quotes.author: Bode Miller

quotes.quoteText: You win a race, the next race it's a question mark. Are you still the best or not? That's what is funny. But that's what is interesting. And that's what is challenging. You have to prove yourself every time.
quotes.author: Michael Schumacher

quotes.quoteText: I retired simply because I didn't have the passion and motivation anymore; I was tired. At the time I thought, 'Well, I had a great time, there is the end.' At some moment, there is the right time to call it an end.
quotes.author: Michael Schumacher

quotes.quoteText: I see myself as the best footballer in the world. If you don't believe you are the best, then you will never achieve all that you are capable of.
quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quotes.quoteText: I think sometimes the best training is to rest.
quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo

quotes.quoteText: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quoteText: The energy of the mind is the essence of life.'
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quoteText: Beauty in things exists in the mind which contemplates them.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quoteText: Heaven and hell suppose two distinct species of men, the good and the bad. But the greatest part of mankind float betwixt vice and virtue.
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quoteText: War is an ugly thing, but not the ugliest of things. The decayed and degraded state of moral and patriotic feeling which thinks that nothing is worth war is much worse.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quoteText: I have learned to seek my happiness by limiting my desires, rather than in attempting to satisfy them.
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quoteText: Only the guy who isn't rowing has time to rock the boat.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quoteText: The best work is not what is most difficult for you; it is what you do best.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quoteText: Wisdom begins in wonder.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quoteText: By all means, marry. If you get a good wife, you'll become happy; if you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quoteText: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quoteText: You can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future. You have to trust in something - your gut, destiny, life, karma, whatever. This approach has never let me down, and it has made all the difference in my life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quoteText: I would like to die on Mars. Just not on impact.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quoteText: When Henry Ford made cheap, reliable cars people said, 'Nah, what's wrong with a horse?' That was a huge bet he made, and it worked.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quoteText: To invent you need a good imagination and a pile of junk.
quotes.author: Thomas A Edison

quotes.quoteText: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.author: Thomas A Edison

quotes.quoteText: One of the things that got me interested in genetics was the relationship between genes and environment. We are all dealt a certain deck of cards, but our environment can influence the outcomes.
quotes.author: Anne Wojcicki

quotes.quoteText: The reality is that the only way change comes is when you lead by example.
quotes.author: Anne Wojcicki

quotes.quoteText: A ship in port is safe, but that's not what ships are built for.
quotes.author: Grace Hopper

quotes.quoteText: No computer is ever going to ask a new, reasonable question. It takes trained people to do that.
quotes.author: Grace Hopper

quotes.quoteText: I walk slowly, but I never walk backward.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quoteText: The best way to predict your future is to create it.'
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quoteText: Do one thing every day that scares you.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quoteText: Remember always that you not only have the right to be an individual, you have an obligation to be one.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quoteText: One thing that education can do is it can provide us with an opportunity to understand one another better, and so while I've spent a lot of my time in the world of politics, I've always felt that it is really not politics that will solve this for us.
quotes.author: Condoleeza Rice

quotes.quoteText: What you know today can affect what you do tomorrow. But what you know today cannot affect what you did yesterday.
quotes.author: Condoleeza Rice

quotes.quoteText: There is nothing like returning to a place that remains unchanged to find the ways in which you yourself have altered.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quoteText: There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quoteText: Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life. Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny, inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quoteText: You'll never find a better sparring partner than adversity.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quoteText: Life is what happens when you are making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quoteText: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quoteText: If everything was perfect, you would never learn and you would never grow.
quotes.author: Beyonce

quotes.quoteText: I think it's healthy for a person to be nervous. It means you care - that you work hard and want to give a great performance. You just have to channel that nervous energy into the show.
quotes.author: Beyonce

quotes.quoteText: Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quoteText: The computer can't tell you the emotional story. It can give you the exact mathematical design, but what's missing is the eyebrows.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quoteText: Do the things you believe in, in the name of love. And know that, you aren not alone. We all have doubts and fear.
quotes.author: Carole King

quotes.quoteText: When I was younger, I was kind of fearless. I think it takes more courage to do things when you know more. I was completely naive, and I was like, 'Why can't I do anything I want to do?
quotes.author: Carole King

quotes.quoteText: You see, we are here, as far as I can tell, to help each other; our brothers, our sisters, our friends, our enemies. That is to help each other and not hurt each other.
quotes.author: Stevie Ray Vaughan

quotes.quoteText: What I am trying to get across to you; is please take of yourselves and those that you love; because that is what we are hear for, that's all we got, and that is all we can take with us. Are you with me?
quotes.author: Stevie Ray Vaughan

quotes.quoteText: Governments never learn. Only people learn.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quoteText: There's no such thing as a free lunch.
quotes.author: Milton Friedman

quotes.quoteText: If you will live like no one else, later you can live like no one else.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quoteText: We buy things we don't need with money we don't have to impress people we don't like.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quoteText: Sometimes your best investments are the ones you do not make.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quoteText: Getting rich is easy. Staying rich is harder.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quoteText: You are only poor if you give up. The most important thing is that you did something. Most people only talk and dream of getting rich. You have done something.
quotes.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

quotes.quoteText: It's not what you say out of your mouth that determines your life, it's what you whisper to yourself that has the most power!
quotes.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

quotes.quoteText: Price is what you pay, value is what you get.
quotes.author: Warren Buffet

quotes.quoteText: Rule No. 1 is never lose money. Rule No. 2 is never forget Rule No. 1.
quotes.author: Warren Buffet
